description: Create a professional construction company website with a strong hero section featuring the headline 'Commercial & Residential Construction Done Right â€” On Time, On Budget', subheadline 'We specialize in renovations, build-outs, and structural upgrades for serious property owners.', primary CTA button 'Request a Free Consultation', and secondary CTA 'View Our Work'. Design should convey trust, strength, and professionalism with neutral construction tones (dark gray, white, black) accented by construction orange or deep blue. Modern, clean typography that's easy to read. Mobile responsive and conversion-focused.

Add About section that emphasizes years of experience, reliability, and problem-solving (delays, poor workmanship, unreliable contractors). Include trust signals: Licensed & insured, Experienced crew, Proven track record. Keep it concise and confidence-building.

Create Services section with clear service cards for: Commercial Renovations, Hotel & Hospitality Renovations, Residential Construction, Structural Repairs, Interior & Exterior Remodeling, Project Management, Design & Build. Each service should briefly explain what problem it solves, who it's for, and why the company is reliable.

Add Why Choose Us section with compelling bullet points: Clear timelines, Transparent pricing, Direct communication, Experienced project management, Quality materials, No surprises. Make it scannable and confidence-building.

Create Projects/Portfolio section showcasing past work with placeholder images for before & after comparisons. Include short project descriptions with scope of work, timeline, and results. Design should highlight transformation and quality.
Add Testimonials section with quotes from satisfied clients that emphasize professionalism, communication, and results. Use realistic placeholder testimonials that sound authentic, not generic.

Create Process section explaining the workflow: 1. Initial consultation, 2. Site evaluation, 3. Clear proposal & timeline, 4. Project execution, 5. Final walkthrough & delivery. Design should build confidence and filter unserious leads with clear step-by-step visualization.

Add Contact/Lead form section with high-quality form fields: Name, Company, Phone number, Email, Project type (dropdown), Project timeline (dropdown), Budget range (dropdown). CTA button 'Schedule Your Consultation'. Form should feel professional and filter for qualified leads. Include company contact information alongside the form.

Create professional footer with: Company name placeholder, License number field, Service areas, Phone number, Business email, Privacy policy link, and social media placeholders. Keep it clean and trustworthy.

Ensure CTAs are strategically placed throughout the page to maximize conversion. Every section should naturally guide users toward requesting a consultation. Sticky or prominent CTAs where appropriate.

Change all orange accent colors throughout the website to deep blue. Update the primary accent color from construction orange to a professional deep blue (navy/cobalt range) that maintains the trustworthy, corporate construction aesthetic. Apply to all CTAs, highlights, icons, and accent elements.

Add the company logo to the navbar (top-left) and footer (centered). Logo path: /home/user/Attachments/7e410b9b-0a3e-42d7-bb15-7231a584b029.jpeg. This is an ornate vintage-style logo with 'SMERISTIK' text on a banner. Size appropriately for navbar (maintain readability without overwhelming the header) and footer. The logo has decorative scrollwork and should be displayed on a clean background that complements the professional construction aesthetic.

Update all contact information throughout the website with the real contact details: Phone number: 305-450-5998 and Email: Smerlincorp@gmail.com. Replace placeholder contact information in the header/navbar, contact section, and footer with these actual contact details. Ensure phone number is clickable (tel: link) and email is clickable (mailto: link).
